name: Color System
description:
Color is a powerful tool people use for communicating, stimulating action, influencing mood, and even modifying behavior. It can affect our performance and consumer behavior, increase appetite, cause anxiety, or, oppositely, soothe emotions.

Understanding different color connotations will help you be more careful while selecting colors for your next design project, marketing campaign, living room paint colors, or even a new car.


Follow my color guide to choose the correct colors for your projects.

If you like my work,

Buy Me a Coffee:)
